text: Rogério Gonçalves Martins (born November 19, 1984) is a Brazilian footballer who currently plays for Asteras Vlachioti as an attacking midfielder. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Asteras Tripolis F.C. players Category:Ergotelis F.C. players Category:Olympiacos Volou 1937 F.C. players Category:Levadiakos F.C. players Category:Niki Volou FC players Category:Panthrakikos F.C. players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Al-Orobah FC players Category:Egaleo F.C. players Category:Doxa Drama F.C. players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:People from Minas Gerais Category:People from Uberaba Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia Category:Association football midfielders
title: Rogério Gonçalves Martins
